DOC.brief_summary: To study effect hydroxypropylmethylcellulose 0.3 % sodium hyaluronate 0.18 % treatment ocular surface disease glaucoma patient .

DOC.criteria: OSDI > equal 20 eye lid inflammation , meibomian gland inflammation , conjunctival injection , follicle tarsus , positive corneal staining , tear break time le 8 second , tear volume le 5.5 mm .
